text: Solution: Number of packets to transfer is 20KB/1KB = 20 packets. The per packet transmission time is: TRANSP = (8x210bits) / (1x107bits/sec) = 819.2usec per packet. The per link propagation delay is PROP = (10m)/(2x108m/sec) = 50 psec The total transfer time is 20TRANSP + 2TRANSP + 2PROC + 3PROP =20x819.2+2x819.2+2x25+3 x50 =18.22 ms.
